name: Push-up
description: An exercise where you start in a plank position and lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor, then push back up.

name: Squat
description: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, bend your knees and hips to lower your body as if sitting back into a chair, then return to standing.

name: Running
description: Continuous running at a steady pace over a certain distance or time.

name: Cycling
description: Riding a bicycle at a moderate pace to improve cardiovascular fitness.

name: Plank
description: Hold a push-up position while keeping your back straight and core engaged for a set period.

name: Burpee
description: A full-body exercise involving a squat, kick-back to plank, push-up, return to squat, and a jump.

name: Bench Press
description: Lie on a bench and press a barbell upwards from chest level until arms are fully extended.

name: Deadlift
description: Lift a loaded barbell or bar from the ground to hip level, then lower it back to the ground.

name: Pull-up
description: Hang from a bar with an overhand grip and pull your body up until your chin is above the bar.

name: Swimming
description: Propel yourself through water using your limbs for a full-body workout.

name: Lunges
description: Step forward with one leg, lowering your hips until both knees are bent at about 90 degrees, then return to standing.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: From a plank position, alternate bringing knees to chest in a running motion.

name: Jump Rope
description: Jump over a rope swung so that it passes under the feet and over the head.

name: Bicep Curl
description: Lift a dumbbell by bending the elbow and bringing it toward the shoulder.

name: Tricep Dip
description: Lower and raise your body using your arms while your hands are behind you on a bench or chair.

name: Yoga
description: A practice combining physical postures, breathing techniques, and meditation.

name: High Knees
description: Run in place while lifting your knees as high as possible.

name: Jump Squat
description: Perform a squat and then explosively jump upward.

name: Bench Step-up
description: Step onto a bench with one foot, press through the heel to lift your body up, then step back down.

name: Rowing
description: Use a rowing machine to simulate the motion of watercraft rowing.

name: Box Jump
description: Jump from the ground onto a sturdy box or platform.

name: Russian Twist
description: Sit on the floor with knees bent, lean back slightly, and twist your torso from side to side.

name: Leg Press
description: Push a weight or resistance away from the body using the legs.

name: Elliptical Training
description: Use an elliptical trainer to simulate walking or running without causing excessive pressure on the joints.

name: Shoulder Press
description: Press weights upward above the head from shoulder level.

name: Pilates
description: A low-impact exercise aiming to strengthen muscles while improving postural alignment and flexibility.

name: Side Plank
description: Support the body on one forearm in a lateral position, keeping the body straight.

name: Leg Curl
description: Flex the lower leg against resistance towards the buttocks.

name: Kettlebell Swing
description: Swing a kettlebell between your legs up to chest level using hip thrust.

name: Battle Ropes
description: Swing heavy ropes in various motions for a high-intensity workout.

name: Wall Sit
description: Hold a static position where your knees are bent at 90 degrees against a wall.

name: Handstand Push-up
description: Perform a push-up while in a handstand position against a wall.

name: Treadmill Running
description: Running on a treadmill at a set speed and incline.

name: Medicine Ball Slam
description: Lift a medicine ball overhead and slam it down onto the ground forcefully.

name: Jumping Jacks
description: Jump to a position with legs spread and arms overhead, then return to the original position.

name: Seated Row
description: Pull a weighted handle toward your torso while seated.

name: Farmer's Walk
description: Walk a set distance while carrying heavy weights in each hand.

name: Sit-up
description: Lie on your back and lift your torso to a sitting position, then lower back down.

name: Spinning
description: High-intensity cycling typically performed in a class setting.

name: Standing Calf Raise
description: Lift your heels off the ground while standing to engage calf muscles.

name: Zumba
description: A dance fitness program involving aerobic movements performed to energetic music.

name: Glute Bridge
description: Lie on your back with knees bent, lift hips off the ground to form a straight line from knees to shoulders.
